title: Master Baker Pantheon

embed.description: EDIT] Updating this thread due to the response it's had from the community. So this thread will now also serve as inspiration for our most desired Pantheon skin. So Riot. Hint, hint. "Master Baker Pantheon" Class of Skin: I imagine this skin would be a Legendary.

body: Rallying the troops to push Riot to let Pantheon achieve his dream!
